commandDescription: print a greeting and your org IDs
idFlagDescription: the id of the project to download. The url is like https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/component-library/tools/playground/<id>/1/edit
templateFlagDescription: The template to use. valid options are sfdx and none
internalFlagDescription: Use the internal version of playground
remoteFlagDescription: The url of the git repository that you want to push your project to
